mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.bumen AS "bumen", a.erji_bumen AS "erjiBumen", a.gangwei AS "gangwei", a.jishu_leibie AS "jishuLeibie", a.from_bumen AS "fromBumen", a.from_erji_bumen AS "fromErjiBumen", a.from_gangwei AS "fromGangwei"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_adjusting_posts( id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, bumen, erji_bumen, gangwei, jishu_leibie, from_bumen, from_erji_bumen, from_gangwei ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{bumen}, #{erjiBumen}, #{gangwei}, #{jishuLeibie}, #{fromBumen}, #{fromErjiBumen}, #{fromGangwei} )
mapper.update: UPDATE check_adjusting_posts SET update_date = #{updateDate}, bumen = #{bumen}, erji_bumen = #{erjiBumen}, gangwei = #{gangwei}, jishu_leibie = #{jishuLeibie}, from_bumen = #{fromBumen}, from_erji_bumen = #{fromErjiBumen}, from_gangwei = #{fromGangwei} WHERE id = #{id}
